label: relatedAnimal
comment: A TT (Track and Trace) animal, such as one kept or raised on a farm or ranch, related to this trade product.

rangeIncludes.comment: A Track and Trace (TT) animal or a group of animals, such as those kept or raised on a farm, ranch.

domainIncludes.comment: Any tangible output or service produced by human or mechanical effort or by a natural process for trade purposes.
